#Text=Paulino Neves
#Text=Paulino
#Text=Neves
#Text=is a tiny town in Maranhão .
#Text=Historically a stopover between Parnaíba and Lençóis Maranhenses , it is trying to develop as a destination of its own .
#Text=Beautiful sand dunes and lakes in the surroundings , much easier to access than those of Barreirinhas .

#Text=The scene has changed completely with the arrival of the paved road from Parnaiba a few years ago , as tourists mostly do n't see the need to stop en-route , other than the 10-minute change from bus to truck .
#Text=As the road to Barreirinhas is set to be paved as weel , this situation will most likely consolidate .
#Text=Get in
#Text=From Barreirinhas to Paulino Neves : R$ 20 by Toyota 4x4 .
#Text=There are always trucks waiting for the bus from Parnaíba .
#Text=Otherwise just sit at the square in front of the chrurch and wait .
#Text=Access from Piauí is easy because the state has a paved road linking Paulino Neves and Parnaíba , via Tutóia .
#Text=Tutóia to Paulino Neves : R$ 5 ; Toyota and buses every day .
#Text=Most of the days there is a bus from Fortaleza to Paulino Neves , departing Fortaleza around 21:30 and taking 12 hours , stopping at Sobral , Camocim and Parnaíba , among others .
#Text=By Expresso Guanabara .
#Text=It is fairly easy to find transport along the beach to Caburé .
#Text=Hiring a truck with driver should be about R$ 150 , taking at least 8 people .
#Text=Otherwise look for a truck gong there to pick up a group .
#Text=The ride should be R$ 20 per person , negotiable .
#Text=See and do
#Text=Walk the sandy streets .
#Text=Visit with locals and get a sense of Brazilian culture and simplistic living .
#Text=Swim in the river , Rio Novo .
#Text=Best spot is on the north bank , some 300 metres northeast of the old bridge .
#Text=If you feel courageous ; -jump from the bridge !
#Text=Visit Pequenos Lençóis .
#Text=See the brilliant white sand dunes with fresh water lagoons in the wet season ( May-September ) .
#Text=Pequenos
#Text=Lençóis is a smaller version of Lençóis Maranhenses National Park : Monkeys , managrove forest , birds , natural ecosystems .
#Text=There is not much tourism in this area .
#Text=To get in , walk to Pequenos Lençóis from Paulino Neves , or take a boat tour from Caburé .
#Text=From the bridge walk north for about 20 minutes to get to the dunes .
#Text=You don´t need a guide , just ask for " dunas " .
#Text=In the wet season , the road is partly submerged .
#Text=Fresh water lakes for swimming .
#Text=Arriving at the dunes , turn northeast and walk for another 20 minutes to get to the beach .
#Text=This gets complicated in the wet season .
#Text=Sleep under the stars and a full moon on the Pequenos Lençois
#Text=Kayak to the mangrove forest .
#Text=See monkeys and exotic birds .
#Text=Relax by the Rio Novo at the few river bars and restaurants .
#Text=Take a boat ride on the Rio Novo .
#Text=Ecological Tours & Tourist Information
#Text=, Rua Deme Trio Ribeiro , 18C ( From the church square , cross the bridge that spans Rio Novo and take the first left ( the main road through town ) .
#Text=Pass through town , about 2-3 blocks , and make a right onto Rua Deme Trio Ribeiro .
#Text=Walk two blocks and the business is on the right ( Next to the empty lot with white fencing ) . ) , ☏ +559884234982 .
#Text=Stop in for information and directions to destinations by foot .
#Text=The office has two large hand-painted wall maps of the whole region , complete with local trails and travel brochures .
#Text=Captain Marin and his fleet of two boats and three kayaks can take you to destinations hidden in Paulino Neves .
#Text=Rent kayaks and take a tour of the mangrove forest , explore its narrow channels and see families of monkeys and exotic birds unique to this region of Maranhão .
#Text=Enjoy an authentic churrasquinho on the white sand dunes of Caburé .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Ivaldo
#Text=( At the main square ) . 10:00 - 21:00 - might close in the late afternoon .
#Text=Limited menu .
#Text=Prato feito R$ 6 .
#Text=Rei do Hamburguer
#Text=( At the end of the street from the main square ) .
#Text=Evenings .
#Text=Burgers at R$ 3 - 5 .
#Text=Aline
#Text=( Just past Rei do Hamburguer ) .
#Text=Drink
#Text=The locals come together on Wednesdays and Saturdays , -the latter drawing more people .
#Text=Follow the noise .
#Text=A few beer spots along the river on the south bank , a few hundred metres east of the old bridge .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=A dozen or so hostels , mostly on the north bank .
#Text=Many cater for longer stays .
#Text=Connect
#Text=Slow internet by the bridge , R$2.50/hour .
#Text=Go next
#Text=You can walk a couple of kilometers across the dunes to the beach .
